entry.title: You Knew the House Was Burning Down
entry.summary:
Author: xompeii

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,647Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 289

Summary: Eddie Diaz starts his first shift at the 118. A major earthquake strikes the city a few weeks later, and suddenly not just one but two of Buck's siblings are trying to reconnect with him. Bobby's trying hard to get some alone time with his girlfriend, but it's a little hard with a roommate (who he insists is not actually his son). Chimney keeps meeting a beautiful woman near his apartment. Hen and Karen are just trying to get five minutes of peace for their family.Or, Part 2 (season 2) of the canon rewrite where Buck ended up in foster care, Daniel lived, and everything is just a little bit different.

entry.title: Open your eyes
entry.summary:
Author: Louidiaz

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,734Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 37

Summary: "Buck" he says more confidently. entry.title: best friends, ex-friends 'til the end (better off as lovers)
entry.summary:
Author: drakesword

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,424Chapters: 3/40Kudos: 7

Summary: A lot of things are gay at this school, Eddie has noticed. It’s not necessarily a new phenomenon, but back in elementary school, that word was only ever hushed, giggled over, never dared to be said in front of the teachers, in fear of being scolded.Here, however, it’s shouted down hallways, said out loud in classrooms, written on blackboards, thrown at the heads of kids who dare to express themselves in the wrong way.So yeah, no thanks. Eddie would rather not approach, or even look at anyone with something remotely close to a social life at this school again. He doesn’t want to make himself a target.Because if there is one thing people should know about him, it’s this: Eddie Diaz is not gay. Or; AU where Buck and Eddie meet in middle school and quickly become best friends. But is that really all they are?

entry.title: My home is yours
entry.summary:
Author: Millowe

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,987Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 29

Summary: It's simply a story of finding love, maybe where it’s not expected. Two oblivious best friends who slowly work their way through a new normal. But everything in life doesn't always go as planned, does it? Especially for these two.—When he hears a low chuckle from the side he looks over and sees Eddie watching him amusedly.“Comfy?” He teases and Buck just gives him a look before snuggling deeper into his spot, pulling the comforter up to his chin, all hesitation from before gone.“No offense to your couch, but yeah.” He mumbles, already feeling sleep slipping into his body, and he blinks tiredly at Eddie and turns on his side towards him. The man just watches him for a moment, a small smile on his lips

entry.title: I Try to Reach For You
entry.summary:
Author: flannelwearer

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,891Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 37

Summary: "Eddie’s hand reached forward to brush back a loose strand of hair from Buck’s forehead where Carla had ruffled it. For a moment, Buck was struck with envy, wishing he could feel the sensation. It was a bit ridiculous, he thought, to be jealous of your comatose self. Eddie’s hand moved down and slowly interlocked fingers with Buck’s limp hand.As Eddie’s hand closed around his, Buck felt something like a quick burst of energy run through his body. Eddie’s breath hitched and Buck wondered if he felt it too."Or after getting struck by lightning, instead of the coma dream Buck has an out of body experience

entry.title: Underneath (the weight of the world)
entry.summary:
Author: Lothely

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,366Chapters: 1/10Kudos: 38

Summary: When he finally came back almost eight months after the ladder truck bombing, Buck hadn't expected a warm welcome from his teammates. But as their resentment towards his choice of suing the LAFD never wavers, he finds himself falling into a spiral of depression that could lead to severe consequences.The Earth never stops spinning on its axis, and just as the sun rises and sets every day and the moon reflects its light, the universe never stops forcing Buck to deal with new and old traumas.A visit from someone from Buck's past fundamentally changes the 118's views about their teammate, as old wounds are poked and left exposed, and everyone is forced to learn how to navigate their resentments and guilt.

Summary: When Eddie Diaz awakens from a coma after a near-fatal shooting, he finds the world he once knew reduced to ash and chaos. A deadly virus has swept across the globe, leaving destruction in its wake and transforming humanity into something monstrous. With no sign of his son Christopher or his team, Eddie sets out into a desolate and fire-scarred Los Angeles to uncover what happened and reunite with those he loves.

entry.title: Only Always Master List
entry.summary:
Author: AmandaPrintz2021

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 407Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 2

Summary: Note: This series explores an established D/s dynamic between Buck and Eddie, including themes of soft domination, intense kink, emotional submission, power exchange, and loving ownership. Every chapter contains heavy NSFW content and deep emotional intimacy. Please heed individual tags. What started with a kiss turned into a vow. What began with a collar became a promise. This is the journey of Evan Buckley and Eddie Diaz — through devotion, submission, desire, and love that never stops choosing each other. Every chapter is a piece of their bond. Every scene, a heartbeat. Welcome to their forever.   This is for the touch-starved. The obedient. The possessive. The ones who whisper “only you” in the dark. For the softness that lives beside the filth. For the leash and the lullaby. For the way they look at each other like home.
